2018-08-20 • computer science ubuntu check version blog

check g++ and gcc version in Ubuntu

check version

gcc --version
g++ --version

Install version

sudo apt-get install -y gcc-4.7
sudo apt-get install -y g++-4.7

Update version

cd /usr/bin
sudo rm gcc
sudo ln -s gcc-4.7 gcc
sudo rm g++
sudo ln -s g++-4.7 g++

check version

ls –al gcc g++
gcc --version
g++ --version
